There is another interesting parallel also with another unexpected death in connection to Obama's birth certificate.
Loretta Fuddy, the Hawaii state health director who verified and approved the release of President Obamaâ€™s birth certificate, died tragically in a plane crash off the island of Molokai.
The plane was carrying 9 persons but Fuddy was the only fatality in the crash.
She died officially of hearth attack but her brother, Lewis Fuddy, says that she did not have any known heart problems.
